## Install

``` sh
pip install nbdev_intgrt
```

## How to use

Hereâ€™s an example of using
[`intgrt`](https://rbagdazian.github.io/nbdev-intgrt/intgrt.html#intgrt)

``` python
import math

lbound = 0
rbound = 1
intvl = 0.0001
func = math.sqrt
result = intgrt(func,lbound,rbound,intvl)
print(result)
```

    0.6666664591970162
